Description:
ReportRunner.parseRenderOptions() should assert the mode as render instead of run.

Steps to reproduce:
1. View the first code in ReportRunner.parseRenderOptions().
assert ( mode.equals( "Run" ) );

Expected result:
The method is for render mode instead of run mode.

Actual result:
In Engine smoke testing, when I tried to generate document and render html from document, I got assertion error.
java.lang.AssertionError
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.parseRenderOptions(ReportRunner.java:449)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.parseOptions(ReportRunner.java:556)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.execute(ReportRunner.java:151)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner.main(ReportRunner.java:118)
